languages.text: "Простите, шерин, но я не вижу себя на этом пути. Знаете, как говорят мудрецы на моем родном мире? "Возьми столько, сколько готовы вынести твои руки и принять сердце. Или Великий за алчность лишит тебя и того, и другого".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, шерин, но я не вижу себя на этом пути. Лучше я
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"
languages.original_text: "Простите, шерин, но я не вижу себя на этом пути. Знаете, как говорят мудрецы на моем родном мире? "Возьми столько, сколько готовы вынести твои руки и принять сердце. Или Великий за алчность лишит тебя и того, и другого".

traits.locale_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我很抱歉，亲爱的，但我恐怕无法踏上这条道路。在我的故乡，你知道那些智者都是怎么说的吗？他们说，‘只该取走你的手与心能带得走的东西，否则至高无上的神皇将会因为你的贪婪将你的一切剥夺。’”
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，亲爱的，但我恐怕无法踏上这条道路。在我的故乡，你知道那些智者都是怎么说的吗？他们说，‘只该取走你的手与心能带得走的东西，否则至高无上的神皇将会因为你的贪婪将你的一切剥夺。’”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

languages.text: «Lo siento, shereen, pero no me veo recorriendo ese camino. ¿Sabe lo que dicen los sabios de mi mundo? "No aceptes más de lo que tus manos y tu corazón pueda soportar o el Exaltado te privará de ambos como castigo por tu avaricia"».
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, shereen, pero no me veo recorriendo ese camino. ¿Sabe lo que dicen los sabios de mi mundo? "No aceptes más de lo que tus manos y tu corazón pueda soportar o el Exaltado te privará de ambos como castigo por tu avaricia"».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「残念だけど、あたしはそんな道を歩むつもりはないんだ。あたしの故郷の賢者の言葉を知ってるかい？『汝の手と心が扱えるだけのものしか持つな。さもなくば、エグザルテッド・ワンがその貪欲さのために、おまえからその両方を奪ってしまうだろう』ってさ」
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: 「残念だけど、あたしはそんな道を歩むつもりはないんだ。あたしの故郷の賢者の言葉を知ってるかい？『汝の手と心が扱えるだけのものしか持つな。さもなくば、エグザルテッド・ワンがその貪欲さのために、おまえからその両方を奪ってしまうだろう』ってさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, Shereen, doch auf diesem Pfad sehe ich mich nicht. Wisst Ihr, was die Weisen auf meiner Heimatwelt sagen? 'Nehmt nur so viel, wie Euer Herz und Eure Hände ertragen. Ansonsten nimmt der Erhabene Euch beides, als Strafe für Eure Gier.'"
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, Shereen, doch auf diesem Pfad sehe ich mich nicht. Wisst Ihr, was die Weisen auf meiner Heimatwelt sagen? 'Nehmt nur so viel, wie Euer Herz und Eure Hände ertragen. Ansonsten nimmt der Erhabene Euch beides, als Strafe für Eure Gier.'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je regrette, shereen, mais je ne me vois pas suivre cette voie. Savez-vous ce que disent les sages de mon monde natal ? "Prends seulement ce qui tient dans tes mains et dans ton cœur, ou l'Exalté te privera des deux pour punir ta cupidité". »
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette, shereen, mais je ne me vois pas suivre cette voie. Savez-vous ce que disent les sages de mon monde natal ? "Prends seulement ce qui tient dans tes mains et dans ton cœur, ou l'Exalté te privera des deux pour punir ta cupidité". »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Üzgünüm şirinim ama kendimi o yola baş koymuş hâlde düşünemiyorum. Yurdumdaki arifler ne der biliyor musun? 'Yalnızca ellerinin ve yüreğinin taşıyabileceği kadarını al. Yoksa Görkemli, açgözlülüğünü cezalandırır ve hiçbir şeyin kalmaz.'"
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, shereen, but I do not see myself on that path. Do you know what the wise men on my homeworld say? 'Only take as much as your hands and heart can handle. Or else the Exalted One will deprive you of both for your avarice.'"

traits.locale_text: "Üzgünüm şirinim ama kendimi o yola baş koymuş şekilde düşünemiyorum. Yurdumdaki arifler ne der biliyor musun? 'Yalnızca ellerinin ve yüreğinin taşıyabileceği kadarını al. Yoksa Görkemli açgözlülüğünü cezalandırır ve hiçbir şeyin kalmaz.'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
